website_summaries.verdict: One can say that the Puma Fierce Quilted really deserves the Kylie-Jenner-inspired hype that it continues to get. This shoe just delivers. Many wearers appreciate its appearance and overall stylishness. Those who are more concerned with performance will also be not disappointed.This pair has been said to be very light and comfortable that one can actually walk miles in them without much issue. At only around a $100 per pair, The Puma Fierce Quilted is a difficult offer to resist.
pros: Almost all of those who bought Puma Fierce Quilted shoes say that the pair really deserves to be endorsed to their friends, family, and colleagues
Several buyers love the stylishness of this pair, saying that they can wear it not only when working out but also also when working
Some wearers say that this attractive pair of sneakers from Puma really provides great arch support
This shoe, which by the way is endorsed by Kylie Jenner, consistently gets high satisfaction scores from active ladies like her
A lot of reviewers think that the Puma Fierce Quilted is so light and comfortable
Some wearers love this pair’s no-lace design because it makes it so easy for them to slip in and out of the shoe
This pair of sneakers is available in colors that will surely please even the choosiest of personalities
A pair of Puma Fierce Quilted shoes is reasonably priced
cons: A handful of reviewers think that the Puma Fierce Quilted runs smaller than expected
there was even one who said that new buyers should consider taking a pair that is at least two sizes larger than what they usually get
At least one reviewer reports that this shoe gets smelly because of some deficiencies in ventilation
acccording to her, the smell can’t be removed even after washing

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers! They are so comfortable and they look great with a gym outfit or with some jeans and cute sweater. I like that is it completely black (including the soles) that give a uniform look to it. I also like that it does not have any laces but is still pretty easy to put on and take off. I work them while traveling and made going through airport security just a little bit easy because I could just slide them off and on. I will probably buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm male, I wear an 8.5 in a mens shoe. But...I liked the stye of this shoe so much, I bought a pair anyways - women's size 9. I will say..expect them to be narrow, as it is a women's shoe. But they will stretch and be more fitting in a few days. I use these for walking around town and strictly at the gym, they work well and no shoe strings to deal with. I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: napsan

customer_reviews.title: Prepared
customer_reviews.text: I actually tried the lace up versions on in a store, so I knew how they would fit before I actually got them. They're more comfortable walking around in them than I imagined. I have a bad back & it takes longer than usual for my back to start hurting with these. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my daughter for a new school year. They are so cute! I love them, I'm about to order some for myself! Color is vibrant & nice, material is what it appears in the picture, she says they are comfortable. We got a half size bigger due to previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: WendyRenae

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I will update after I wear them for a full day. For now I will say they look great, awesome quality. They fit perfectly for me, but I do have very small feet (5.5), so I can't tell if they would be narrow on a larger size foot. But they fit me great. They are very comfortable. They are the real thing, they came brand new in a perfect condition box.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: They have good arch support but not much support in the ball ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a small toe box. I got my regular size for sneakers (8) and will need to wear thin socks. They have good arch support but not much support in the ball of the foot. They seem comfortable enough and certainly look good, but I have not yet worn them for an extended amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley E

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The lightest most comfy sneakers ever! I bought them for vacations, because I do a lot of walking. I walked 8miles in them the first day in Bermuda and they were a pleasure!!! I wore them hiking in Colorado and once again they did not disappoint. I can't wait to test them out in Iceland!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Warwick Plotkin

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn, they feel so soft and snug. I wear these everyday. The fit is as expected for me, I bought my normal size for runners and sneakers which is one size above my normal shoe size. I wear a 6-6.5 in normal shoes, runners I always buy as a size 7. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: PenPen

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable, beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: I have Pumas that are similar to these and LOVE them for my boot camp/HIIT workouts. Light as air and soooo comfy. Stylish too! I love the purple color of these!
customer_reviews.author: Savage

customer_reviews.title: Weight Training Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fave workout shoes! Great for heavy weight training and snug comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love them very light weight easy to slip on, the only that sucked when they came packaged they did have paper wrapped around them no cardboard insoles in the shoe to keep them In-Shape like they where just thrown in the box and shipped off my box was all crushed and ugly looking with no protection!

customer_reviews.text: I'm a dancer and have a wide foot so they are a little tight around the ball of my foot but I'm hoping they will stretch a bit the more I wear them. Super cute and stylish!

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: The shoe and box were in bad condition the box seemed very old and beat up also shoes one is a different shade from the other seems a little dirty very unsatisfactory. I thought id get a better quality shoe and packaging as it is supposed to be brand new

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, it is the one I am wearing during my recovery after foot surgery, the fabric at the toe is a sort of fragile, after wearing three times I noticed slight fraying, but I still receive compliments on the shoes everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Angel1

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are wonderfully comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderfully comfortable right out of the box. I wear a 9.5-10 and I always buy sneakers in a 10 to make sure that I have room for thick socks and these fit exactly as I would expect them to. I like the elastic across the top of the foot as it holds my foot securely in place. It's not too tight and they are easy to pull on. I might just buy them in another color.

customer_reviews.text: Idk if this is just me , but I don't like when I see glue on my shoes , I feel like it's super cheap . Only reason I got these were because my fav. Star wore them & so I was like , Hey ! Why not !? They're affordable . I double checked if I got them from the actual company puma & that seemed correct. But like I said , maybe it's just me

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Fierce Quilted Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description: Designed to be both versatile and functional. Rihanna inspired collections including the fierce mix performance ready technology with trend right silhouettes and details. Optimal comfort and supportive upper. Medial and lateral support for 360 degree movement. This spec includes a seasonal relevant quilted upper material.
